p: Two dose-response pot experiments were set up in the Spring–Summer 2019 in the greenhouse of the Pôle Universitaire in Chartres (France), without regulated light and temperature. Bottom of each pot (1 L vol.) was lined with a layer of a standard filter paper, to prevent leaking. White mustard ( Sinapis alba L.) cv. Zlata (purchased from Caillard, www.graines-caillard.com) was the experimental model “weed”.
